702667f-b.text:
25th Avenue, west from Harway Avenue to Cropsey Avenue. Ln the lower left hand corner appears part of what later became known as the Old Spot Cafe, at the ~S. E. corner of Cropsey Avenue; at the S. W. corner is the American Casino and Restaurant, and on the right is the porch of the Old Oak Hotel, at the N. E. corner
of Cropsey Avenue.
Views 2 and 3 show full views of the Old Oak Hotel.
Views 1,2: March, 1925
View 3: March, 1929
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection
(4)
The Old Spot Cafe, at the S. E. corner of 25th and
Cropsey Avenues, partially seen at the lower left hand corner in View 1. Cropsey Avenue was formerly Harway Avenue and Harway
Avenue was Cropsey Avenue.
May 28, 1939
P. L. Sperr
